page.description: GetApplicationCurrentVersion gets the most recent version number of the application published.
page.prototype: .GetApplicationCurrentVersion as L (BYREF Version as N, Application as C)

argument.name: BYREF Version
argument.description: A numeric variable into which to retrieve the current version.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
